23a6(mdo 'grel): rjes su rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa/ 'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rigs par bya ba 'di len par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar brtag par bya ba ma yin
23a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ 'di ltar phra ba/ 'di ltar zhib pa/ 'di ltar blta dka' ba/ 'di ltar rjes su rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa/ 'di ltar mkhas shing
23b1(mdo 'grel): mdzangs pas rigs par bya ba 'di len par gyur pa de dag ni nges pa kho nar gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtogs par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid gzugs shes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
23b2(mdo 'grel): par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtag par mi 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa gzugs zhes bya bar
23b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/
23b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog
23b5(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang
23b6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med
23b7(mdo 'grel): pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
24a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi pa rnam par
24a2(mdo 'grel): shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
24a3(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur/ /dben pa rnam par shes ba zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du skye zhes bya ba dang/ 'gag ces bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus
24a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang
24a5(mdo 'grel): dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ tshad med ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ bden pa dang/ de
24a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir
24a7(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad
24b1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ma med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa rnam pa thams cad
24b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag pa
24b3(mdo 'grel): med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam
24b4(mdo 'grel): par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par yi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid
24b5(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'dus byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar
24b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi
24b7(mdo 'grel): khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi ba 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya par rnam par rtog par mi
25a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas
25a2(mdo 'grel): kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar
25a3(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//
25a4(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya ba rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi ba 'dus ma byas
25a5(mdo 'grel): kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i
25a6(mdo 'grel): bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nas/ de ltar shin tu 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa dang/ de ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i bar 'di len par byed pa su yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
25a7(mdo 'grel): de ni 'di ltar 'di las chos 'ga' yang ma brjod/ ma bstan/ yongs su snang bar ma byas pa ste/ 'dir chos 'ga' yang ma bshad/ ma bstan/ yongs su snang bar ma byas pa de kho na ltar 'di len par byed pa'i sems can su yang mi 'byung ngo//
25b1(mdo 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum pa nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs
25b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan pa ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir yang bstan pa ma yin nam/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' i lam 'di lta
25b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/
25b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon
25b5(mdo 'grel): par shes pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa gzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
25b6(mdo 'grel): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir yang bstan pa ma yin nam de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin
25b7(mdo 'grel): nam/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/
26a1(mdo 'grel): bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag skye ba gzhan du mang rgyun chad
26a2(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'khrug pa med pa dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par gyur pa ma yin no/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa ma yin nam/ /rgyun
26a3(mdo 'grel): chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang/ rigs pa'i spobs pa dang/ 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang/ don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa ma yin nam/ rab
26a4(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis smras? pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher
26a5(mdo 'grel): bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba yang bstan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis so//
26a6(mdo 'grel): gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhe na/ bdag dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shes las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
26a7(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ mig gi 'du ste reg pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dag de
26b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i
26b2(mdo 'grel): tshul dang/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha' i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
26b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam?
26b4(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i
26b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i
26b6(mdo 'grel): tshul dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na shes
26b7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/ ci'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan/ ci'i phyir na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'gyur
27a1(mdo 'grel): shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ dngos po
27a2(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong de nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba bstan to/ /mi dmigs pa'i
27a3(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
27a4(mdo 'grel): 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa dang/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char 'di ltar phab cing bstan na/ de la bdag cag gis kyang me tog dag mngon par sprul ste/ me tog rnams kyis
27a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang/ gnas brtan rab 'byor dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par gtor bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
27a6(mdo 'grel): brgya byin dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha nas brtsams te/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mchad ra ba mang po mngon par sprul? te/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/
27a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dang/ rang dge slong? gi dge 'dun rnams dang/ gnas brtan rab 'byor dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par gtor bar gyur to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur to/ /kun tu rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
27b1(mdo 'grel): nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi me tog de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gzhi me tog gis khengs par gyur nas steng gi bar snang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de nas
27b2(mdo 'grel): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sdun chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/ /'di ltar lha'i du ngag gis mngon par gtor ba'i
27b3(mdo 'grel): me tog 'di dag ni shing dang/ ldum bu dang/ 'khrid shing las byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste 'di dag ni shing dang/ ldum bu dang/ 'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
27b4(mdo 'grel): gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no/ /shing dang/ ldum bu dang/ 'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di skad du me tog 'di
27b5(mdo 'grel): dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin/ shing dang/ ldum bu dang/ 'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no/ /zhes zer na/ kau shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog kyang ma yin no/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag
27b6(mdo 'grel): kho na ma byung ba yin nam/ 'on te gzugs kyang ma byung/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka me tog 'di dag kho na ma byung ba ma yin gyis/ kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste /
27b7(mdo 'grel): gang ma byung ba nga ni gzugs ma yin no/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka mig ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no/ /kau shi ka
28a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung
28a2(mdo 'grel): gi khams dang/ nam mkha' i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /kau shi
28a3(mdo 'grel): ka de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka dran
28a5(mdo 'grel): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du yang dag par spyod pa rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag
28a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ bden pa dang/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i
28a7(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/ /kau shi
28b1(mdo 'grel): ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba
28b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ gang? ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin
28b3(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rten rigs bstan pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
28b4(mdo 'grel): to/ /kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/ chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni
28b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste/ de ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la chos nyid kyang ston to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la chos
28b6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyang ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal ba bstan to/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang
28b7(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/ /kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'ga' rnam par mi 'gal lo/ /gang mi 'gal rnam
29a1(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gal ba de ni/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do/ /kau shi ka so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
29a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
29a3(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spongs ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang
29a4(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
29a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po rnams dang/ de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
29a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa ni btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal ba bstan to/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin
29a7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/ de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/ /kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni mi 'gal ba
29b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ gang? mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do/ /kau shi ka de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni btags pa dang 'gal bar mi byed la chos nyid kyang ston to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
29b2(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam du bstan to/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa
29b3(mdo 'grel): ni gzugs la mi slob/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi slab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ /de bzhin du gang la bslab par bya ba'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang
29b4(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol
29b5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob te/ de ci'i
29b6(mdo 'grel): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi slob/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yang mi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i
29b7(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la mi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar  
30a1(mdo 'grel): des gang la bslab par bya ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/
30a2(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi slob/
30a3(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub la mi slob/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad
30a4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ tshor ba dang/
30a5(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam bar shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
30a6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ gang la bslab par bya ba'i bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi
30a7(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ /rab 'byor gyis smras ba/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi stong ngo//
30b1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam bar shes par rnam bar shes pas stong ngo/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
30b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs
30b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid
30b4(mdo 'grel): kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/ /kau shi ka gang stong pa nyid la slob pa de ni gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob po/ /gnyis su byar med par tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la
30b5(mdo 'grel): slob bo/ /gnyis su byar med par so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med ba rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams
30b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon bar shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag
30b7(mdo 'grel): par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la bslab bo/ /kau shi ka gang gzugs stong pa nyid la gnyis su byar med pas slob pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la gnyis su byar med pas  
31a1(mdo 'grel): slob pa de ni gnyis su byar med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/ /de ni gnyis su byar med pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes
31a2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po/ /de ni gnyis su byar med pas nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/ /dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo/ /de ni gnyis su byar med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
31a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams la slob bo/ /de ni gnyis su byar med pas tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
31a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo/ /gnyis su byar med pas ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob bo/ /gnyis su
31a5(mdo 'grel): byar med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med gzhal du med pa la slob bo/ /gnyis su byar med pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub nyid la slob bo/ /gnyis su byar med pas  
31a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa las drod du gtogs pa yin no// //gzugs 'phel bar
31a7(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ /'grib bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes la 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched
31b1(mdo 'grel): 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
31b2(mdo 'grel): bzod? pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir
31b3(mdo 'grel): mi slob bo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang bo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phel bar bya ba dang/ 'grib bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshad med pa rnams dang/  
31b4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib
31b5(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad
31b6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob ba dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs
31b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang/ med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing
32a1(mdo 'grel): 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang/ med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin ba rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshang med pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
32a2(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ bden ba rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang/ med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
32a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'bres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtse mor gtogs pa
32a4(mdo 'grel): yin no// //bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ shA ri'i bus smras ba/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang/ med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang
32a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang/ med bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi bar yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs
32a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su gzung du med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs kyis gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam bar shes pa
32a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su gzung du med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas yongs su gzung du med pas so/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang
32b1(mdo 'grel): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon bar shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su gzung
32b2(mdo 'grel): du med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos ma 'dres pa chos ma 'dres pas yongs su gzung du med pas so/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung du med de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
32b3(mdo 'grel): kyis yongs su gzung du med bas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
32b4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol na phyin pa la slob bam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid du nges bar 'byung dam/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
32b5(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ngos par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi bzod par gtogs pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
32b6(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang/ med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
32b7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod ba'i tshe/ gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong/ 'gag ba dang/ blang ba dang/ dor ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ sogs pa dang/ 'bri ba dang/ 'grib
33a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ 'phel ba mi mthong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis med pas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
33a2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi mthong/ 'gag pa dang/ blang ba dang/ dor ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ sogs pa dang/ 'bri ba dang/ 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba mi mthong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni 'di
33a3(mdo 'grel): ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis med pas so/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu
33a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
33a5(mdo 'grel): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi mthong/ 'gag pa dang/ blang ba dang/ dor ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par
33a6(mdo 'grel): byang ba dang/ sogs pa dang/ 'bri ba dang/ 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba mi mthong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs pas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
33a7(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa dang/ sogs pa med pa dang/ 'bri
33b1(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang/ 'grib pa med pa dang/ 'phel ba med pa'i phyir slob na/ mi slob pa dang/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa
33b2(mdo 'grel): yin no// //'di dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gsungs pa yin no// //de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus
33b3(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa rab 'byor 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi
33b4(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes zer ba de khyod kyi mthu yin nam/ khyod kyi byin gyis rlabs yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/ 'di ni bdag byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
33b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'on de su'i mthu su'i byin gyis rlabs/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlobs so/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa byin gyis brlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gzhan na
33b6(mdo 'grel): yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs med pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir de skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /'di ni
33b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so zhes smras pa/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byin gyis rlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/ de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs
34a1(mdo 'grel): pa mi dmigs so/ /byin gyis rlabs med pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byin gyis rlabs med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /
34a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs
34a3(mdo 'grel): kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par
34a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du phung po rnams dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/
34a5(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa la
34a6(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
34a7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa
34b1(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ldan pa yang yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pas so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
34b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin bas so/ /kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin bas so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
34b3(mdo 'grel): byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin bas so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pas so/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa/ gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral
34b4(mdo 'grel): ba yang ma yin bas so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin bas so/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin
34b5(mdo 'grel): bas so/ /rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin bas so/ /rnam pa
34b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pas so/ /rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pas so/ /kau shi ka 'dir chos thams cad dang
34b7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de'i mthu ste/ de'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul gyis so/ /kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni gzugs las
35a1(mdo 'grel): btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
35a2(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka de ni 'di 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba gang yin pa dang/ 'du shes gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ btsal ba gang yin
35a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid cig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
35a4(mdo 'grel): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
35a5(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas
35a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa
35a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
35b1(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan shes
35b2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam
35b3(mdo 'grel): gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/
35b4(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin du
35b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/ rnam par
35b6(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab
35b7(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid ma yin/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gzhan shes rab
36a1(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
36a2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing
36a3(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa ste/ de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas na gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
36a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes
36a5(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes ba las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par
36a6(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin du so so
36a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med
36b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs ba rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ /
36b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi
36b3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid
36b4(mdo 'grel): las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la phan yon dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas gtan rab 'byor la 'di skad
36b5(mdo 'grel): ces smras so/ /btsun ba rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
36b6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang la
36b7(mdo 'grel): bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang byang chub rab tu 'thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam
37a1(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
37a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
37a3(mdo 'grel): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
37a4(mdo 'grel): gang la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rang byang chub 'thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
37a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
37a6(mdo 'grel): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mdza' 
37a7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mdza' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
37b1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di chen po nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mdza' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mdza' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten
37b2(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon
37b3(mdo 'grel): par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
37b4(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chen po yin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam
37b5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mdza' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mdza' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chen po nyid yin no zhes bya
37b6(mdo 'grel): ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzugs la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs tshad med pa
37b7(mdo 'grel): ni dmigs su med pas so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' i tshad ni dmigs su med de/ kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs la tshad med do/ /gzugs la tshad med pa'i
38a1(mdo 'grel): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med pa'o/ /kau shi ka tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
38a2(mdo 'grel): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs
38a3(mdo 'grel): su med de/ nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa la tshad med do/ /rnam par shes pa la tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pas so/ /kau shi ka de
38a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa
38a5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas
38a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad
38a7(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med pas so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad
38b1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'o/ /kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
38b2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
38b3(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med pas so/ /kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' i tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs la tshad med do//
38b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no// //
38b5(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka gzugs mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mdza' dang dbus mi dmigs pas so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du
38b6(mdo 'grel): shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mdza' dang dbus
38b7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
39a1(mdo 'grel): dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams
39a2(mdo 'grel): cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mdza' yas pa'i
39a3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mdza' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka rnam grangs des na
39a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mdza' yas pa'i phyir dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mdza' yas pa'i phyir mdza' yas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu dgag pa yin no// //
39a5(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
39a6(mdo 'grel): ji ltar na dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams
39a7(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung ba dgag pa yin no/ /kau shi
39b1(mdo 'grel): ka gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i
39b2(mdo 'grel): phyir chos dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos kyi dbyings mdza' yas pa'i phyir/
39b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rab tu skye ba dgag pa yin no// //kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i
39b4(mdo 'grel): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir
39b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mdza' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mdza' yas so//
39b6(mdo 'grel): de ltar de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rkyen dgag pa yin no// //kau shi ka gzhan yang
39b7(mdo 'grel): sems can mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir sems can
40a1(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdza' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di
40a2(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla gdags yin/ lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig gi bla gdags ma yin gyi/ 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags
40a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'di ni dngos po med pa'i ming du gtags pa'o/ /'di ni dmigs pa med pa'i ming du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sems can du bshad pa gang yang
40a4(mdo 'grel): yod dam/ lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te sems can du bshad pa med na de la sems can mdza' yas pa ci yang med pa'o/ /kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs
40a5(mdo 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/
40a6(mdo 'grel): lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam grangs des na sems can mdza' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
40a7(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa mdza' yas par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi sems can gyi khams kyi ched du 'jug pa gsal bar bstan pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa yin no/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i
40b1(mdo 'grel): lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/ e ma'o chos/ e ma'o chos/ chos rnams kyi chos
40b2(mdo 'grel): nyid 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te bshad cing brjod la rab tu gsal bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
40b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnams par shes pa 'am/ rnam pa thams
40b4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos zhes bya ba gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa mchis te/ gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'o/ /de nas bcom
40b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs sam tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
40b6(mdo 'grel): gyi chos zhes bya ba gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa yod de/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'o/ /lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
40b7(mdo 'grel): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gang zhe na nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
41a1(mdo 'grel): theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid las gzhan dang/ phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan dang/
41a3(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spang ba rnams las
41a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ bden pa dang/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin
41a5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo las yang gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs
41a6(mdo 'grel): pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/ /lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la slob pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
41a7(mdo 'grel): por byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo/ /lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod
41b1(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang mar me can zhes bya ba'i tshod dus kyi dbus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/
41b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong
41b3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bar dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
41b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ lam rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs
41b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur
41b6(mdo 'grel): te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/ /lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
41b7(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'gyur ro/
42a1(mdo 'grel): zhes nga lung bstan to zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
42a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang/ de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
42a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
42a4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
42a5(mdo 'grel): pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthun par 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen
42a6(mdo 'grel): ma'i 'khor bzhi dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams dbang du bcugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la
42a7(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
42b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ 'tshang bar 'gyur ba dang/ klog par 'gyur ba dang/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang/ sgom par 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur ba dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang/ gang yang rnam pa
42b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar byed pa de dag ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi gzugs stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur
42b3(mdo 'grel): bas so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur bas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la
42b4(mdo 'grel): glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed pas so/ /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/ pha rol tu
42b5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa rnams dang/ bden pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge
42b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/ de
42b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin du stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
43a1(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed pas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags
43a2(mdo 'grel): rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med pas so zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
43a3(mdo 'grel): mo de dag la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi don du byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/
43a4(mdo 'grel): dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nyam nga ba ma spangs par dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
43a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ de dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'am/ 'thab bral ba 'am/
43a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan pa 'am/ 'phrul dga' ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa 'am/ tshangs ris pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'dun na 'don pa 'am/ tshangs 'khor ba 'am/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
43a7(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa gang yin pa dang/ lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang/ ma gzung ba dang/ ma bcangs pa dang/ ma klags pa dang/ kun chub par ma byas pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi
43b1(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no//
43b2(mdo 'grel): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dpa' yang ma bral bar byed
43b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni kau shi ka khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung/ lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa 'am rengs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi
43b4(mdo 'grel): bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po
43b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang/ 'thab bral dang/
43b6(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i bar phyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod la de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs
