179a3(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/
179a4(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams
179a5(mdo 'grel): cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag
179a6(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa
179a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
179b1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal pa 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzugs de ni med do/ /gang rtag pa
179b2(mdo 'grel): 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa de ni med do/ /de bzhin du gang
179b3(mdo 'grel): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
179b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas
179b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin
179b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de ni med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs
179b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba yin no// //bam po sum cu dgu pa/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa
180a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
180a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
180a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
180a4(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/
180a5(mdo 'grel): lam rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med
180a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
180a7(mdo 'grel): ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas
180b1(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
180b2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang//
180b3(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad
180b4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa
180b5(mdo 'grel): ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no// //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180b6(mdo 'grel): po rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
180b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs chags pa
181a1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa dang/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang/ ma chags pa
181a2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /mig chags pa dang bcas pa dang/ ma chag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid
181a3(mdo 'grel): chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du kham dang/ skye mched dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang/ ma chags pa zhes
181a4(mdo 'grel): bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang/ gzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
181a5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags
181a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad chags
181a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
181b1(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
181b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnam dang/ rnam par
181b3(mdo 'grel): shes pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang
181b4(mdo 'grel): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan
181b5(mdo 'grel): ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
181b6(mdo 'grel): shes pa med do rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
181b7(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa dang bcas pa dang ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor
182a1(mdo 'grel): ba yin no// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan
182a2(mdo 'grel): kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan par 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
182a3(mdo 'grel): de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan yang yongs su mi 'grib /bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
182a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha' i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang /nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba
182a5(mdo 'grel): med do/ /bsngags ba ma yin pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /nam mkha' ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba yin no// / /
182a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skye bu ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /bsngags pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa
182a7(mdo 'grel): brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i sbyor ba yin no// //rab 'byor
182b1(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa na sems zhum pa dang/ g.yengs par mi 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab
182b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir brtson par byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni bka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
182b3(mdo 'grel): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'i slad du ste/ nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /
182b4(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' 
182b5(mdo 'grel): la ni gzugs su btags pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar ma mchis so/ /'du shes su ma mchis/ 'du byed rnams su ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni rnam par shes par btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags
182b6(mdo 'grel): pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar
182b7(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni yang dag par sbong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ lam rnams
183a1(mdo 'grel): su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags
183a2(mdo 'grel): pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon
183a3(mdo 'grel): par shes pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
183a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du
183a5(mdo 'grel): btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags
183a6(mdo 'grel): pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rang byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so/ /rab
183a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di bags pa de dag ni nam mkha' i don du sbyor bar
183b1(mdo 'grel): 'tshal/ bskul bar 'tshal/ khyab par 'tshal ba dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bges pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das sems rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa de dag ni go cha
183b2(mdo 'grel): chen po bgos pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba dka' ba'i sbyor ba yin no// //bcom ldan 'das
183b3(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la bteg par 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor bar dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// //bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can
183b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/
183b5(mdo 'grel): 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos
183b6(mdo 'grel): bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grengs ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'bri ba 'am gang bar btags pa mi gda' o/ /de ci'i
183b7(mdo 'grel): slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i spang dang/ sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal
184a1(mdo 'grel): lam/ bu ram gi shing tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs
184a2(mdo 'grel): pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can gyi khams la 'bri ba 'am gang bar btags pa mi gda' o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i
184a3(mdo 'grel): slad dang/ sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol
184a4(mdo 'grel): bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o zhes bya ba ni las bya dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no// //de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung
184a5(mdo 'grel): por gdags su yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por gdags su yod do/ /shes rab kyi phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rgyun tu
184a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags su yod/ rang byang chub tu gdag su yod/ de bzhin gshegs
184a7(mdo 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gdags su yod/ dkon mchog gsum du gdags su yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gdags su yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gdags su yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma
184b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'i sbyor ba yin no// //de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
184b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par
184b3(mdo 'grel): bya bar sems pa de dag ni nam mkha' la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
184b4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba ji lta ba/ zhig du bgyi
184b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shig gang khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab ba dang/ sba bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang
184b6(mdo 'grel): sba bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang/
184b7(mdo 'grel): bskyab ba dang/ sba bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' 
185a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar sems pa de dag ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar sems pa'o/ /ko'u shi ka
185a2(mdo 'grel): de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang/ sgra brnyan dang/ mig yor dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
185a3(mdo 'grel): pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar gang sems pa de ni
185a4(mdo 'grel): bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar nus sam/
185a5(mdo 'grel): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ /ko'u shi ka de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab
185a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ bsam gyis
185a7(mdo 'grel): mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
185b1(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar gang sems pa ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yin no// //brgya byin gyis smras
185b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang/ gzugs brnyan lta
185b3(mdo 'grel): bu dang/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom
185b4(mdo 'grel): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
185b5(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te/ 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so// //ko'u shi
185b6(mdo 'grel): ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs
185b7(mdo 'grel): la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas
186a1(mdo 'grel): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed /
186a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
186a3(mdo 'grel): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus
186a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
186a5(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
186a6(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/
186a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi
186b1(mdo 'grel): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi
186b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no// //de nas
186b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba
186b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang/ tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs chen pa rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi ris kyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
186b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong de/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod
186b6(mdo 'grel): do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang/ ming 'di nyid dang/ rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge
186b7(mdo 'grel): slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong
187a1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ steng dang/ 'og gi phyogs rnams dang/ mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong gi yi ge 'di nyid dang/ ming 'di nyid dang/
187a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang/ thams cad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu ba byed cing chos
187a3(mdo 'grel): ston pa mdzad pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid
187a4(mdo 'grel): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
187a5(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
187a6(mdo 'grel): nyid 'chang par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dbang du gyur pa shes par byed pa yin no// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
187a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtag gang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
187b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
187b2(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug
187b3(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am
187b4(mdo 'grel): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
187b5(mdo 'grel): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par
187b6(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du so so ba
187b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ sdus pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/
188a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar
188a2(mdo 'grel): pa brgyad rnams dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs
188a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang/ /ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang/ /
188a4(mdo 'grel): ` da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
188a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
188a6(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par
188a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ 'phags pa'i bden
188b1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma
188b2(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
188b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no// //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
188b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du
188b5(mdo 'grel): shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu
188b6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/
188b7(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
189a1(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes
189a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji
189a3(mdo 'grel): ltar na tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten
189a4(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i
189a5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs
189a6(mdo 'grel): bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
189a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'o
189b1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/
189b2(mdo 'grel): khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
189b3(mdo 'grel): bdun rnams dang/ tshad med ba rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med
189b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba
189b5(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon
189b6(mdo 'grel): mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no// //rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
189b7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i smad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
190a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
190a2(mdo 'grel): dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
190a3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos pa med
190a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no// //rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
190a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam
190a6(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i
190a7(mdo 'grel): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyed ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
190b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190b2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no// //gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
190b3(mdo 'grel): 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du/
190b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //gang nam mkha' dmigs su med
190b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
190b6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
190b7(mdo 'grel): dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no// //rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
191a1(mdo 'grel): pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par byang ba ma
191a2(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
191a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
191a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub bar bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang/ sna'i nad dang/ lce'i nad dang/
191a5(mdo 'grel): lus kyi nad dang/ yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus rgas pa dang/ 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byed par mi 'gyur ro
191a6(mdo 'grel): chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos
191a7(mdo 'grel): smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang/ bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
191b1(mdo 'grel): de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar
191b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor
191b3(mdo 'grel): gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin
191b4(mdo 'grel): po che yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no// //rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi
191b5(mdo 'grel): skye gnas las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs
191b6(mdo 'grel): sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /shes
191b7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do/ /de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs sA la chen po rnams yod
192a2(mdo 'grel): do/ /bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams
192a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od chung gi lha
192a4(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams yod do/ /dge chung gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams yod
192a5(mdo 'grel): do/ /bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /rab lha'i lha rnams yod do/
192a6(mdo 'grel): legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha
192a7(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/
192b1(mdo 'grel): rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams
192b2(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes
192b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod
192b4(mdo 'grel): do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
192b5(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa id+gu rnams yod do/ /stong pa
192b6(mdo 'grel): nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnams yod do/ /mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu rnams yod do/ /de bzhin
192b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
193a1(mdo 'grel): bar du yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do/ /chos dkon mchog yod do/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do/ /
193a2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa
193a3(mdo 'grel): yin no// //rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
193a4(mdo 'grel): skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ dge ba
193a5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa dang/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten
193a6(mdo 'grel): las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no//
193a7(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni gang gis kyang gos pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol
193b1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos po med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no// //rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par rtog
193b2(mdo 'grel): par mi byed?/ de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang/ bla mar
193b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba dang/ brjed par bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
193b4(mdo 'grel): sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no// //
193b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ mi ston par byed pa ma yin/ ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/
193b6(mdo 'grel): skye bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ chad par byed pa ma yin/ rtag par byed pa ma yin/ don gcig pa ma yin/ don sna tshogs pa ma yin/ 'ong par byed pa ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa
193b7(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa
194a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o// //rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa 'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams
194a2(mdo 'grel): las 'das par byed pa 'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'das par byed pa 'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin /
194a3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam dang/ stobs dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nang
194a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
194a5(mdo 'grel): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden
194a6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma
194a7(mdo 'grel): yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' i sa bcu ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog bar byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am
194b1(mdo 'grel): 'phrog bar byed pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
194b2(mdo 'grel): lam rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
194b3(mdo 'grel): bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed
194b4(mdo 'grel): ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i
194b5(mdo 'grel): dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste/ /gnyis pa'o// //bam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ so so'i
194b6(mdo 'grel): skye bo'i chos ster ba 'am/ 'phrogs par byed pa ma yin/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/
194b7(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa 'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings
195a1(mdo 'grel): nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs
195a2(mdo 'grel): par sangs rgyas te mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo/ /ston to/ /'grel te/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de
195a3(mdo 'grel): ga sha phyung nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog utpa la dang/ ku mu da dang/ puN+DA rI ka dang/ man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba
195a4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
195a5(mdo 'grel): ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor bar yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
195a6(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar
195a7(mdo 'grel): mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /de
195b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo//
195b2(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid
195b3(mdo 'grel): kyis stong ngo/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang /
195b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis
195b5(mdo 'grel): stong ngo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /stong pa nyid
195b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong
195b7(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
196a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi sa stong ngo//
196a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /de bzhin
196a3(mdo 'grel): du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo/ /rab 'byor
196a4(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos
196a6(mdo 'grel): kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba 'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
196a7(mdo 'grel): gang bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba 'am
196b1(mdo 'grel): mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis par bskor bar bgyi ba 'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
196b2(mdo 'grel): bstan pa dang/ rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ btags pa dang/ rab tu bkod pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang/ rnam par dkrol ba dang/ mtshon pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyis pa dang/ yang dag par
196b3(mdo 'grel): bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung/ gang sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so//
196b4(mdo 'grel): gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni sus yang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs
196b5(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o// //'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so/ /'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su
196b6(mdo 'grel): 'brangs nas dag par btags pa las/ thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
196b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
197a1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
197a2(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
197a3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzib ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad dmigs su med ba'i
197a4(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i
197a5(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbubs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su
197a6(mdo 'grel): med ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog
197a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang rnam par dbyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
197b1(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba
197b2(mdo 'grel): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
197b3(mdo 'grel): ni mi 'phrog ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
197b4(mdo 'grel): ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
197b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
197b6(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed ba po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom
197b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
198a1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir
198a2(mdo 'grel): ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa
198a3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rmi lam mthong pa dmigs su
198a4(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrar brjod pa dmigs
198a5(mdo 'grel): su med ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs dang gzugs
198a6(mdo 'grel): brnyan dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab ba dmigs
198a7(mdo 'grel): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa
198b1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon
198b2(mdo 'grel): mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
198b3(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol
198b4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i
198b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
198b6(mdo 'grel): ni rlom sems ma mchis ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
198b7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no// //rab 'byor gyis
199a1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med
199a2(mdo 'grel): ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
199a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
199a4(mdo 'grel): pa/ chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags
199a5(mdo 'grel): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199a6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
199a7(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
199b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
199b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
199b3(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
199b4(mdo 'grel): ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdza' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdza' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
199b5(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab
199b6(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog tu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan phyogs kyi sa dang/ rang
199b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
200a1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis
200a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad ma dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
200a3(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha' i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
200a4(mdo 'grel): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
200a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
200a6(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab
200a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med
200b1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshon nyid mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad mtshan ma
200b2(mdo 'grel): med ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med
200b3(mdo 'grel): ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa
200b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su
200b5(mdo 'grel): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong ba nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
200b6(mdo 'grel): su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong ba nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ chen po stong pa
200b7(mdo 'grel): nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
201a1(mdo 'grel): pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
201a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
201a3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
201a4(mdo 'grel): ni mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
201a5(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
201a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs
201a7(mdo 'grel): su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
201b1(mdo 'grel): 'du byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
201b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b4(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med
201b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no//
201b6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang/ tshor ba dang/ sems dang /
201b7(mdo 'grel): chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
202a1(mdo 'grel): dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
202a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ sems dang/ dpyod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dad pa la sogs pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
202a4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202a5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
202a6(mdo 'grel): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa'i
202a7(mdo 'grel): lam la brten pa'i rnam pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bas
202b1(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam
202b2(mdo 'grel): par rtog pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon
202b3(mdo 'grel): lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
202b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
202b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa
202b6(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
202b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
203a1(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
